microstructure: bcc matrix phase containing Laves and Zr 2 Al-type second phase particles
evidence: The crystal structure, microstructure, density and compression properties of a novel AlNbTiVZr 0.5 high entropy alloy are reported. After homogenization the alloy is composed of bcc matrix phase containing Laves and Zr 2 Al-type second phase particles. The alloy has low density of 5.64 g cm -3 . The yield strength of the alloy gradually decreases from 1430 MPa at room temperature to 680 MPa at 800°C and drops to 75 MPa at 1000°C.

microstructure: bcc matrix phase containing C14 Laves and Zr2Altype phase particles
evidence: In this work, structure, density and compression properties of a novel AlNbTiVZr 0.5 high entropy alloy were reported. The homogenized alloy is composed of bcc matrix phase containing C14 Laves and Zr 2 Altype phase particles. The density of the alloy is 5.64 g cm -3 . At room temperature, the alloy demonstrates high yield strength of 1430 MPa, and can be compressed to 50% height reduction with cracking observed only on specimen surface.
